page.title: 06Shrewsbury Golf Club.
page.content: When we visited the golf course at Condover,Mr.Morrison,the secretary, showed us round the greens.He said that there were 55 bunkers which had to be raked every day.The sand is delivered from Norton Quarry once a year. There are lots of grass cutters for different parts of the course.The rough is cut by a gang mower.The approaches to the greens are cut by a cushman which has spikes that aeriate the grass.The greens themselves have very fine grass which is watered by automatic sprinklers twice each night. There is a professional golfer who gives lessons and has a shop where you can buy new equipment or get old equipment repaired. There is also a snooker room,two bars,a dining room and changing rooms with showers.
